summary: You want more armor enchantments and you also miss the old enchantments 'Life Detection' and 'Invisibility' from Oblivion. This modification contain 29 new enchantments and one new follower (WIP).
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://oi40.tinypic.com/24b3qlg.jpg[/IMG][/center]

You want more armor enchantments and you also miss the old enchantments 'Life Detection' and 'Invisibility' from Oblivion. This modification contain 29 new enchantments (For all enchantment descriptions checkout the readme) and one new follower (WIP).

Go to Riften where you'll meet the troll Marian.

[center][IMG]http://oi43.tinypic.com/293doox.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center][SIZE="14"][B]Enchantment list[/B][/SIZE][/center]

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00010.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Displacement enchantment:[/B]
- Exchanges your position with an attacking target with a chance of 5%

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00013.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Flamewalk enchantment:[/B]
- You start to leave a trail of fire behind yourself when engaged in combat

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00009.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Dislocation enchantment:[/B]
- Get a 5% chance to teleport attacking targets to a random location

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00022.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Shadowstep enchantment:[/B]
- Causes you to appear behind an attacking target with a chance of 5%

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00005.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Arma-chicken-don enchantment:[/B]
- Throws an exploding chicken in a random direction every 4 seconds when in combat

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00025.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Wisp Shield enchantment:[/B]
- Creates an orbiting shield of 3 wisps that explode upon enemy contact
- Dealing 25 damage per wisp
- Wisp respawn got a cooldown of 3 minutes

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00014.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Force Knockback enchantment:[/B]
- You got a chance of 5% to knock attacking enemies back

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00012.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Fear enchantment:[/B]
- You got a chance of 5% to fear attacking enemies

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00015.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Force Push enchantment:[/B]
- You got a chance of 5% to force push attacking enemies

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00008.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Disarming enchantment:[/B]
- You got a chance of 5% to disarm attacking enemies

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00021.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Shadowcloak enchantment:[/B]
- Just like the invisibility enchantment but it'll just activate when you are sneaking
- You get additional sneak bonus points

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00018.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Last Chance enchantment:[/B]
- When you got less than 25% health the time slow down for 15 seconds
- This enchantment got a cooldown of 15 minutes
- When the enchantment is fully charged a message box will appear

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00019.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Lightning Embrace enchantment:[/B]
- A random enemy will receive 5 damage points (every 5 seconds)
- New visual effects

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00016.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Frozen Shield enchantment:[/B]
- You got a chance of 5% that attacking enemys become frozen

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00011.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Constant Ethereal enchantment:[/B]
- When you have less than 25% health you got the chance of 5% to become ethereal

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00024.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Subterfuge enchantment:[/B]
- As soon you are in a combat every 15 seconds subterfuge gets casted
- Every enemy around you will become insane

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00023.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Shield Of Revenge enchantment:[/B]
- Enemies who attack you will receive 5 damage points
- Attackers get roastet
- New visual effects

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00020.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Description of the Constant Night Vision Enchantment:[/B]
- You can see in the dark

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00017.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Description of the Constant Invisibility Enchantment:[/B]
- If you are not sneaking you'll have to wait 5 seconds till you become invisible again.
- If you are sneaking you'll have to wait ca. 1 second till you become invisible again.
- As soon as you do something like for example speak to an actor you'll become again visible. After 1-5 seconds you'll become invisible again.
- If a forced guard dialogue happen and you become invisible during the dialogue, the dialogue gets aborted. (As soon you are in the "decision menu" it won't get aborted.)
- When you are invisible and guards are searching you because you did a crime, forced guard dialogues won't happen.
- Forced story dialogues will still happen even if you are invisible.
- NPCs will just detect you if you collide with them or when you are visible.

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00006.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Description of the Constant Detect Life Enchantment:[/B]
- Hostile NPCs will glow red.
- Friendly NPCs will glow blue.

[center][IMG]http://www.datainjector.de/aie/2013-08-11_00007.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[B]Description of the Constant Detect Life Sneaking Enchantment:[/B]
- Same like detect life but it'll be just active while sneaking
author: CryptHanky

files.name: Additional Item Enchantments Version 2
files.changelogHtml:
Added Shadowcloak Enchantment
Added Disarming Enchantment
Added Force Push Enchantment
Added Last Cance Enchantment
Fixed some Stuff

files.name: Additional Item Enchantments Version 5
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed enchantment naming
Improved Script of some enchantments (Maybe you need to reequip your items.)
Nerfed some enchantments
Improved some effects

files.name: Additional Item Enchantments Version 6
files.changelogHtml:
Changed every tooltip
Changed many visual effects
Added a new quest + a new location
Added two new enchantments
Nerfed every enchantment

files.name: Additional Item Enchantments Version 7
files.changelogHtml:
Added five new enchantments
Fixed some visual bugs
Fixed race bug
Changed the condition of the \"Give me...\" dialogue option

files.name: AIE Remake Version 1
files.changelogHtml:
Everything made from scratch
removed all that heavy,robes etc. crap
fixed some stuff
optimized script
removed everything of the quest

files.name: AIE Remake Version 1_1
files.changelogHtml: fixed shadowcloak and invisibility had some weird stuff going on (thanks to VegasAssassin)

files.name: AIE Remake Version 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
- now recognize dialouges (invisbility & shadowcloak)
- native onHit events are better debugged (invisbility & shadowcloak)
- react on animation events (invisbility & shadowcloak)
- fx changes (invisbility & shadowcloak)
- improved over all script (invisbility & shadowcloak)
- fixed dummy z-offset which leaded to hitting ground (revenge & shock)

files.name: AIE Remake Version 1_3
files.changelogHtml:
- nearly nerfed every enchantment, they all now base on your enchantment level the higher it is the better are the effects (if you don't like that please comment and I'll try change it to something else)
- fixed weird invisibility behavior when picking up items
- added 2 enchantments Torture and Convincing
- changed some description
- manages handles now better
- somehow some scripts are executing faster now

files.name: AIE Remake Version 1_5
files.changelogHtml:
added waterwalking
added gray cowl
added waterbreathing
added levitation
added new follower (wip)

files.name: AIE Remake Version 1_6
files.changelogHtml:
added detect all
added detect all sneaking
changed tooltips (by dupasqk)

files.name: AIE Remake Version 1_6a
files.changelogHtml:
fixed enchantment name
fixed exception in script
